channel.title: Homes on Labra's home page
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Labra's home page

item.description: Biography Associate Professor, University of Oviedo, Spain. Founder and main researcher of WESO (Web Semantics Oviedo) research group, which collaborates with different companies around the world applying semantic web technologies to solve practical problems. Member of Web of Things and Data Shapes W3C Working Groups and of Shape Expressions, SHACL, RAX (RDF and XML interoperability) and Best practices of Multilingual Linked Open Data W3C community groups. Previously, He was coordinator of the Master in Web Engineering - University of Oviedo (2016-2017), and Dean of the School of Computer Science Engineering - University of Oviedo (2004-2012).

item.title: Teaching
item.description: I teach the following courses: Software architecture - Bachelor of Software Engineering, University of Oviedo, Spain. This course is taught in Spanish and English. Semantic Web - Master in Web Engineering, University of Oviedo, Spain Advances in Semantic Web - Master in Web Engineering, University of Oviedo, Spain Web systems and applications - Master in Information Technology, Technical University Federico Santa María, Chile I also taught the courses:
